actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reduce from ten years to five years the period during which a service-connected disability must have been in effect immediately preceding a veteran's death in order for the veteran's survivors to be eligible for dependency and indemnity compensation.

summary.text: Reduces from ten to five years the period during which a service- connected disability must have been in effect immediately preceding a veteran's death in order for the veteran's survivors to be eligible for dependency and indemnity compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reduce from ten years to five years the period during which a service-connected disability must have been in effect immediately preceding a veteran's death in order for the veteran's survivors to be eligible for dependency and indemnity compensation.
